website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel chronograph with sapphire crystal and beautiful brown strap keeps time and date, and includes tachymeter, luminescent hands.
pros: 2-year warranty on this classy watch that packs a lot of function, as well as sophisticated beauty
Water-resistant to 300 feet or 100 meters – suitable for swimming and snorkeling
Looks much more expensive than the price tag belies
Go from dressy occasions to the pool or beach
cons: Some users report models were shipped with an aging or failing battery
Some models have chronograph indicator sitting just shy of the 12 o’clock position

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. The quality of the case, leather watch band, and sapphire crystal are all top notch. The dial is extremely easy to read, and the leather band is very comfortable on the wrist. I did receive the watch with the hands misaligned, however, after researching on the web, I was able to reset the watch and it works perfectly. I have included a few pictures with my review so you can see it in person. The last shot was taken with a UV light so you can see the lume (the blue color is from the UV light). I highly recommend this watch to anyone looking for a high quality Swiss made timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, but losing time
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, hate to part with it, but after a week, it is losing about 20 minutes per day overnight, around midnight, it looks like. Looks like it might have to go back... Update: it turns out the watch came with a weak/fading battery. After replacing it, no more overnight loss of time. [In the hours before & after midnight, when the date switches, the watch uses the most energy. A week battery would slow down operation, resulting in lost time.] Now the watch isn't just beautiful, but it is keeping time beautifully, so I'm switching my rating to four stars (would be five if this seller sold watches after checking battery atrength).
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Suastegui

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, elegant and functional
customer_reviews.text: Have the matching stainless steel (model 249035) version and wanted the gold tone for color. Victorinox makes an awesome watch and very durable. Watch maker of choice without going to the exotic/elite brands that cost many multiples of this watch. Package delivered on time and in original Victorinox box complete with original paperwork/instructions. Only issue was a dead battery, but I expected as much for a watch that has been out of production for at least 3 years and for reduced price on a new watch. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RDEBOIS

customer_reviews.title: Needs to come with a manual.  And the right manual.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this watch. There was no manual provided, and after searching extensively online and finding the virtual manual that matched the correct watch model, I still couldn't get the chronometer to work. When I eventually heard back from Victorinox customer service, I was told that different movements were sometimes installed in the same model of watch, and that mine had one of those movements; they offered to send me a document they had created in-house in the customer service office which would teach me how to use the watch features, but by that time I'd already given up and returned the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The watch is quality made and it's evident. The Swiss are great at a bunch of things, including cheese, chocolate & watches. It's a very attractive timepiece with a nice weight, comfortable wear and average thickness. I think anyone would appreciate the details of a quality timepiece. Hoping there's a bit of ruggedness to the watch as my friend who will be the recipient, does a lot of hiking and outdoor adventure activities. I'm only giving it 4 stars until time tells the rest of a 5 star story
customer_reviews.author: PSlack

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son who said he really liked it. I pored over the many watches listed on Amazon before I chose this one. When I saw it I didn't like the white bezel around the watch, although when I read those words I didn't know what they were talking about. If I had I would have chosen a different one. I hope my son likes it and isn't disappointed. The quality is very good, packaging sturdy and impressive. If it wasn't for the white ring around the outside of the watch it would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Portia51

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a white chrono and to find a Vic swiss army for 99 is outrageous!The detail of the watch is superb,inner bezel pitched and marked at seconds and fives, bold raised numbers inset with silver outline and a sharp white Victorianox logo at 12 o'clock!.Case is polished chrome on top and brushed chrome on sides. I wear alot of white in Fla. and this will satisfy my OCD! Flying Fashion gets a big round of applause for lightning fast shipping! Thank you FF
customer_reviews.author: tomazon

customer_reviews.text: Showed up in original manufacturers box and all the hands align correctly. Only giving four stars right now because I’ve owned the watch for a whole 2 hours. Don’t wana jump the gun on 5 just yet. But, so far very satisfied. I am experiencing none of the things explained in multiple negative reviews. Absolutely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: URSULA SALAS

customer_reviews.title: A great quality well made watch that has exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: A great quality well made watch that has exceeded my expectations. The band is great as well. I am thrilled as it also came with the manufacturers warranty. Previously I have tried other watch products that had higher retail prices. These turned out to be of poor quality. If your looking for a well made quality watch this Victorinox is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful white watch! Short band...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised by the size of the case and the watchband was really short. I could only get it to the first or second hole. There was barely enough left to go under the first band loop let alone the second one. I like the look of it though and I will buy a longer band if I don’t have one lying around. Otherwise it is a beautiful addition to my considerable watch collection of varying cost $50-$5000; brands Seiko to Omega; and styles formal to street.
customer_reviews.author: cshepperson

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead
customer_reviews.text: The battery is dead when it arrived. Like what I read in the reviews. I've purchased a few watches through Amazon and this is the only one with a dead battery. On the other hand, the quality of the watch and the leather strap seems and feels high. Friends who saw the watch on me also had similar remarks. Will observe further but I suggest you rely on what majority of the reviews says because it is quite reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The watch is nice but it didn't come in the fancy box that ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is nice but it didn't come in the fancy box that was shown on the website. Instead, it came in a cheap cardboard box with a foam insert. This was a gift, so packaging was important. When spending almost $300 for a watch, I expected it to be presented better. UPDATE: My husband has now had this a little over a year and it stopped working. The stopwatch doesn't reset to "12" and it periodically stops and then starts up again. We have had the battery replaced and do not want to invest any more money into this piece of junk to have it repaired.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch! Great brand! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: The clock is amazing. I bought it for my wife and the quality Swiss Army is evident in everything, the box the manual, the guarantee and last but not least, a spectacular chronograph for only 135 dollars. Excellent seller and delivery from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Juan pablo

customer_reviews.title: It looks exactly like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the pictures! Amazing watch, just beautiful. Not to big and not to small. Looks elegant but not too much so you can use it with a casual look or a more elegant one. I would definitely recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's a good watch, it keeps time well
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous watch, it certainly looks the part. The gold platting is still in immaculate condition after 4 months. My only hang up about the watch is its 30 minute chronograph, because obviously measuring anything that takes longer than 30 minutes is a bit of a hassle. Other than that it's a good watch, it keeps time well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kyalo

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today so it's still pretty new to me but when I took it out of the box the first thing I said was damn this watch looks amazing. It's definitely the nicest watch I've ever had. I'm still trying to figure out the functions but I really like what I see so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Gaudet

customer_reviews.title: That the second hand do not rotate around the hours
customer_reviews.text: I love the look but only wish that the large second hand would move around the watch like it should. Other than that I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch for the price, which is cheap for a Victorinox. Band is on the short side, so be mindful if you have a large wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not working.
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice watch but is showed up not ticking. Maybe the battery is dead? But batteries usually last several years. Will take it to watch repair to see whats the problem Replacing batteries on waterproof watch is not cheap if you take it to a reputable place that will insure it is sealed back up properly and water tested.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: I loved it! This one was a fourth of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch to replace the same brand of a very expensive watch I purchased 10 years ago that was recently stolen. The original was heavier, but when I dropped it a few times, it always needed minor repairs. However, I loved it ! This one was a fourth of the price, it's a little smaller and lighter. I love the look. Overall I am happy with it. However, it was hard to part with my original.
customer_reviews.author: Joel C. Riedel

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful and is a pleasure to wear. However I had to replace the battery soon. I expected that though.
customer_reviews.author: James Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Timepiece value and style all in one, quality second to none
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a beautiful timepiece. IMHO it is on a par with Rolex Daytona. Great movement. Nice blue dial and bracelet. Great value for a watch. It will last for a long time and give lots of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful child-sized watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch face is beautiful, but this is a child's watch. It barely fit on my wife's small wrist. Amazon sent a replacement, that was the same size and used! It is a child sized watch.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Geat looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Really sharp looking watch. I was wondering if the Arabic numerals and markers all glow, and they do. The band is extremely comfortable. With the exception of atomic timekeeping, this is one of my most accurate quartz watches. More than $200 under the MSRP price tag (that it came with out of the box) and lightning fast delivery from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Just as stated
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in 3 days after placing the order, earlier than expected. It's great I've received several compliments. Thank you, would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love Victorinox's and will continue to buy them but THIS ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Victorinox's and will continue to buy them but THIS model's strap after a week smelled so bad I can no longer wear it, not kidding. I've done everything to remove the smell and I'm going to have to buy another strap. I've never had a strap smell so bad so quickly, this strap is pathetic and in no way waterproof or genuine leather.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa Realtor

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few months now and have been very pleased. It looks great and I catch people checking ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this watch for a few months now and have been very pleased. It looks great and I catch people checking it out.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: First very nicely on my wrist. I'm 5'10, 170 LBS and the case diameter looks nice on me. If you are a bigger person, or have bigger wrists, it might be too small. However, fits perfectly on me, looks great and I've gotten tons of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: J's

customer_reviews.title: Seller should be removed from Amazon vendor list
customer_reviews.text: Watch did not operate right out of the box (dead battery), made it difficult to tell time. Reordered another one, if this one does not work, I will not buy anything from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: bobhills

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It’s kind of early to review, but so far it arrived functional and on time. I’ve never had a chronograph watch before as it is somewhat odd to figure out, but I got there and now I’m hooked. The real test will be if it hold up over time. And keep the time for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Quality timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch for its dial and white colour bezel. I changed the white leather to a 3rd party metal strap and it looks even better. Good value for the chrono movements.
customer_reviews.author: Lee E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch. Doesn't look or feel as nice as ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. Doesn't look or feel as nice as the $400+ versions. NO DIRECTIONS!. There are directions for a lot of other Victorinox chrono models included, but none for this one.
customer_reviews.author: David Moran

customer_reviews.title: Components not zeroed
customer_reviews.text: I got a good discount but got a factory defected product. The battery was completely spent. I replaced the battery. Afterwards, i realized the chronological components do not zero and the minute hands changes at 30 seconds not 60 seconds. However the watch keeps good time even though the components aren't zeroed.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Good daily watch.
customer_reviews.text: It's worked very well for me. I picked up 2 different bands to rotate through and both look sharp with it. I've also received compliments about the watch and unique face color. The color is more rich and radiant than in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK P KOWNACKI

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Swiss Chronograph Watch
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Its a beautiful Swiss watch with chronograph, and it keeps perfect time. Leather band is very soft, and 41mm is perfect size for my wrist. The watch is elegant and black dial is very attractive. You cannot ask for more for the price Amazon is offering this watch! I would recommend to grab one before they are all gone!
customer_reviews.author: Asif Beg

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with Purchase- Buy Now!
customer_reviews.text: It came nice. I like the black finish to it. Very good for small wrists, it is a small watch. Has both a Tachymeter and A chronograph. IT comes with a box inside a box inside a box. Came with a watch face anti scratch plastic thingie. All in All, Extremely satisfied with purchase. Great job Victorinox. I rate 6/5
customer_reviews.author: Caveat Emptor

customer_reviews.title: I received the watch today, but the box is ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the watch today, but the box is totally different of photos in the site add. The box material and apperence are different. Why.? I want to know about it. I looking forward your reply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for a long time now, never missed a beat, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Not much else to say. Works perfectly. Keeps time.. n looks good doing it. I was initially unsure about the number font - n how it fit into the overall scheme - but it honestly couldnt be better. The bezel isn't anything too "flashy", and lies fairly flush to the watch face. The leather band was suprisingly VERY comfortable, and the entire watch itself is not too big, nor too small. As posted, I find it a great purchase and would recommend to any of my dude friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Swiss watch by a reputable brand
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Swiss watch by a reputable brand. The whole watch is beautiful; the case, bands, face, everything. The amazon photo doesn't do it justice. For $200 this is an absolute steal. The movement is Swiss Quartz, specifically an ETA G10.211. Very accurate and lasts forever. I was between this watch or  I am very happy with the choice I made, at less than half the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it totally if you like big watches.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, it's heavy and it looks solid. I recommend it totally if you like big watches.
customer_reviews.author: Dhalsim Mar

customer_reviews.title: Watch is handsome and looks nice, but two weeks after delivery I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch is handsome and looks nice, but two weeks after delivery I had to change the battery. In addition the watch delays a munite every ten days and I have to adjust it. If I weren't living in Argentina I would give it back and ask for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Diego Naveira

customer_reviews.title: Watch still works after all of THREE WEEKS!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 3 weeks - what can I say other than, “yes, it’s still working! Um-freakin-mazing craftsmanship!”
customer_reviews.author: dv

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work right out of the box, sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jered Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and exceeds out expectation so far
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and exceeds out expectation so far. Bought if for my wife for Valentine's Day gift, she loves it. The band is stiff but sure it will get better with time. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: masterluke

customer_reviews.title: Great for guys!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had his old Swiss Army watch for like 13 years. He finally wanted/needed to upgrade, so after days of searching, he stuck with Swiss Army...he found this one online and loved it. When we got this one, it is even better looking in person. Very cool and a nice heavy weight. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S. Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch for this price
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks incredible. Easily looks and feels as good as many $1000+ watches. This is the watch I wear most and after over a year it has been flawless. Obviously the stainless band has some wear on it but the sapphire crystal is immaculate. Worth every penny and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: The watch looks good but i hate the band
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks good but i hate the band. Its a pain to resize it. The pins were difficult to get out even with watch repair tools. The band looks decent.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Longevity
customer_reviews.text: My husband so enjoys this watch. It isn’t too bulky on his wrist. It is understated while still conveying a bit of class. He has worn it a year now without any problems arising.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Rosenquist

customer_reviews.title: This is my secondwatch of this type
customer_reviews.text: This is my second watch of this type. The first had a white face and worked great for about 3 years. I never take my watches off so they are abused pretty often. I like the look of this one better and it functions exactly as it should. For $250, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Biff

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research before I purchased this watch for my husband. Looks and feels expensive (good weight, shiny but not too shiny, etc) without being too flashy; looks great with a suit or with a t shirt and jeans. Jomashop had the best price I could find. Highly recommend this watch!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: luvamazon

customer_reviews.title: Just got this watch today. Watch is not in ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this watch today. Watch is not in new condition. White band looks crusty and old... hair line scratches it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one ddeserves a 10
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular about the watches I purchase. I have a very eclectic collection and all I can say is that this watch is just a beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: a lot of years of use and is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only negative is the leather strap that i need to replace cause use. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous WatcH
customer_reviews.text: This watch is gorgeous! Be aware, that the battery may be dead when the watch arrives. You may need to have the battery replaced before giving this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: t.hayward

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Mi wife love it, she was looking for a gold watch and she didn't want a MK, this is great option
customer_reviews.author: Federico Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great Watch that has the style and quality on par with other Swiss Watches that cost 10 times as much as Victorinox. I'd buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Ray-Cine

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep time
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this watch, BUT it loses about 20 minutes every 24 hrs [Update] The watch now loses 5 minutes every hour.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice!
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice watch for the price. Looks and feel of quality, elegant watch, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yolly111

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch,, UT it won't keep time proper need to a adjust a couple minutes every few days.junk!
customer_reviews.author: Eli m

customer_reviews.title: Nicewatch. I had it delivered a few days ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. I had it delivered a few days ago and it looks just as it does on-line. So far, my only concerns are that it is much heavier than I expected. Also, the band scratches easily. After just two days of wearing in an office environment, band has scratch marks.
customer_reviews.author: reef

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great look, high quality, suites both casual and formal wear!
customer_reviews.author: David Kutidze

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this watch looks and feels more expensive than it is. I would give it 5 stars, but the stopwatch seconds hand is not tap dead center at the 12 o'clock position and it's annoying me. It's only a bit off, but enough that I notice it. I'm sure I could get it fixed whenever the battery runs out and it has to be opened up. Besides that, I would highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: D. F.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Spent quite a bit of time looking for a good everyday watch that was nice enough for the office, but also casual enough to wear with jeans. This watch covers it all. I got the band sized shortly after receiving it and since then I've had multiple people comment on it everyday I wear it. Could not have asked for a better product and the price could not be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good watch. I changed the leather band to one rubber one.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Great quality and the clasp is great too. Returned because it's a little smaller thought I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Moser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch. I don't have massive wrists so I was worried if this will look too big on my hands. But this fits perfectly and I get compliments from everyone. Amazon always has the best prices.
customer_reviews.author: Prady S

customer_reviews.title: 241405] Feels and looks of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression is good, looks of high quality. Hands, numbers, date and chronograph are easy to read. Bracelet feels solid. The only problem was not the watch, but the protective film that left a sticky residue along the bracelet which required some alcohol to remove and about 8 minutes. Watch itself would have gotten a 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksanrd Ryazanov

customer_reviews.title: nice watch
customer_reviews.text: great watch. self winding and beautiful. received it a day before expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Really beatiful watch
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this watch, elegant and a little sprty at same time, solid ans modern
customer_reviews.author: Juan Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch - I loved it, but it was a bit too small for my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Excelent materials and finishes. I love this brand. Good price for a swiss made watch.
customer_reviews.author: Diego A. Osorio H.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and in perfect shape in the factory box with all the documentation. I am very pleased with the overall quality of the watch and bracelet. It looks great! Luckily I found a chart on line to compare watch face sizes (in my case 41mm diameter versus 45mm). Thus I was able to choose this watch which is proportionate to my wrist. I'm only three weeks in , but so far the watch is keeping perfect time.
customer_reviews.author: Wood Guy

customer_reviews.title: It's not a real victorinox and I have proof
customer_reviews.text: This is a chinese knockoff. I know that because I own a real one and when I went to replace the battery, I discovered it's a chinese counterfeit. NOT TO THRILLED! I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Goog looking watch for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very nice. I bought it without never having even touched it before and it exceeded my expectations. Victorinox is a great brand (I am a long time fan of their produts). Its price was also fair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend wears it all the time and it looks so sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Eats batteries though
customer_reviews.text: Just what you would expect from Victorinox. Nice quality. Eats batteries though.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch the finishing is very nice it is a nice watch for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kaushal S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. Great size, great color. Victorinox is always on point... I own several.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: I got the watch on 2015, less than 2 years and the baterry started to fail. I swim every day and usually dont take of the watch. In less than 3 years the watch stop working, very bad experience. I had to replace the baterry more than 3 times, It had a lot of moisture on it. It suposed to be for swiming. Now I m trying to see another one. Hope the warranty works this time.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: love it. I can see the hands
customer_reviews.text: Watch arrived..love it. I can see the hands, looks classy and is everything I was looking for. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great styling, function
customer_reviews.text: Great styling ,function ,fit . Third Victorinox I have owned . Will probably get another soon . Only issue is ,the luminous parts are not staying visible for long .
customer_reviews.author: Donnie  V.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for this watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Excellent quality and look. It have a mix of classic and young design that can be used on different occasions. Everything works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my husband for Christmas. He ruined his Tag Heuer in the pool last summer. This one is a considerably less expensive watch than the Tag, and I was a little worried that this one wouldn't seem as nice. It just came today, and I love it! The face doesn't look as dark as I thought it would, which I think is actually a good thing. It is a really nice looking watch - even nicer , I think, than in the picture. Can't wait until he opens it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Very attractivewatch. Keeps correct time
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive watch. Keeps correct time. Cannot go wrong with swiss.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Watch looked nice but was loose in the shipping package so I returned it but it was very nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Black SUV

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but it did not work for long and the hour hand was off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: This timepiece is a really good one, fits perfect, not to big, not to small
customer_reviews.author: Juan Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it... and I have no dislikes
customer_reviews.author: clint broadway

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: its not working well and the guarntee which i got is not stamped need to be adjusted every 2 days , it looses about 5 minutes a day
customer_reviews.author: hossam

customer_reviews.title: Great timepiece.
customer_reviews.text: I am complemented all the time about the Victorinox and it feels very natural on my wrist. I wanted a nice dress watch for going out but now I wear it all the time, even to work and it holds up great. No scratches on the glass and the watch has been slammed, dropped, and knicked with no damage. I plan on getting another Victorinox soon because of their great looks, solid construction, and great time keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Van E. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Subtle stainless watch
customer_reviews.text: The dial face in an attractive shade of gray and makes this watch unique. I like most will never use the Chrono feature. Bank is light and well made. Face is not too large of clunky.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch wish the manual was more helpful
customer_reviews.text: Really like it, would be five stars if not for the useless instructions. They cover so many different watches it is impossible to figure out how this one works. Anyone know how the chronograph functions are activated? Is there a stopwatch function? How about an alarm? I did manage to get time and date set after some fiddling. Had to return it it was losing about a minute per day. To get it fixed on amazon warranty would take three weeks! Reordering and hope the new one will be more accurate. Lowering my rating to three stars meanwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my boyfriend. We both love it and definitely couldn't beat the price on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and striking watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a brown leather band watch that is classy and can straddle from casual to business casual settings. I've received this watch and am really loving it. The aeshetics are better even than the straight on image. Worth checking out in person.
customer_reviews.author: Erik M. Bengtsson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't pulled it out of the box but at first glance it's beautiful!! I hope my groom loves it as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: Jenell

customer_reviews.title: Thewatch is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful, but I happen to have very thin wrists, so the face was much too large to fit my needs. The metal strap combined with the size of the watch face also makes for a pretty heavy load on the wrist as well.

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is nice enough. The band is garbage. Also the pins are the weak link. Any time you bang it they pop loose and you are lucky not to lose the watch. I tried bigger pins and soldering the pins, no luck. It is supposed to be kind of an outdoor sportsmans timepiece and it is really a delicate paperweight. It goes keep time, so I got that going for me which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, but as every other Victorinox watch... it scratches very very easily.
customer_reviews.author: lqueremel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch.
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish watch, comfortable to wear, keeps great time, love the black face. My first Victorinox watch purchase, goes with any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lowe
